feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.32.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Test against SQL Server 2017, get JSON aggregation of relationships working under 2017. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14515
  • Apply new relationship retrieval to all SQL DBs by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14509
  • Feature flag the branch action definition by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14522
  • Fix relationship popover click behaviour by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14539
  • Fix long popover for relationship column pickers by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14540
  • Fix to accommodate filtering updates for GoogleSheets by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14542
  • Enrich views by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14541
  • [BUDI-8579] Create more realistic tests for Google Sheets by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14535
  • More google sheets tests by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14548
  • SQL - utilise JSON aggregations for relationships by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14532
  • Part 1 of 2: Platform level AI Configuration by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14543

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.31.8...2.32.0

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.32.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • onEmptyFilter fixes for logical operators by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14555
  • Adding SQS 2.1.1 CTE capable binaries by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14559
  • Export publishEvent by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14560
  • SQL - use CTEs to avoid pagination issues with large tables by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14557
  • Update logic when no branch condition is met by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14562
  • updating budibase apps image to use alpine by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14564
  • Allow an account holder to login to account-portal if the tenant has been deleted. by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14547

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.32.0...2.32.1

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.32.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixing role API validator (for saving) by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14565
  • Re-add account-portal tests into Budibase CI by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14569
  • Add GPT-4o and GPT-4o-mini models by @digisz in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14568
  • Fix user access roles from displaying business by @ConorWebb96 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14368
  • Update account-portal ref by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14571
  • Role metadata and view controls by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14570
  • updating JS dependencies to get rid of vulns by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14572

New Contributors

  • @digisz made their first contribution in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14568

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.32.2...2.32.3

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.32.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Role name and display name updates by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14579
  • Fix for row automation triggers when table deleted by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14581

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.32.3...2.32.4
